sentences.sContent: My mother would still like me to be a missionary in Africa.
sentences.sCn: 我母亲还是想让我在非洲做一名传教士。

sentences.sContent: ...to be swept along by their missionary passion...

phrases.pCn: 传教士式体位（指男上女下的性交姿势）

remMethod.val: mission(天职) ＋ ary → 担任天职的人 → 传教士

trans.tranOther: someone who has been sent to a foreign country to teach people about Christianity and persuade them to become Christians
